item.title: [Global][Baremetal] - efiBootloaderPath mandatory as input for BYOI BOIL
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 5, 11:00 - 11:30 UTC

Jan 7, 15:47 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Baremetal offer.

Start time : 05/02/2025 11:00 UTC
End time : 05/02/2025 11:30 UTC
Service impact : Starting next month, the EfiBootloaderPath will be required as an input for these templates.
Service improvement : This change will enable customers to customize their EFI bootloader path, if you have any questions or need further clarification, please contact Support.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [GRA6/8][Virtual Private Servers] - Network maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jan 22, 21:00 UTC  -  Jan 23, 05:00 UTC

Dec 24, 10:31 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our network infrastructure.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 22/01/2025 21:00 UTC
End time : 23/01/2025 05:00 UTC
Service impact : None. Except during the rollback phase (scheduled between 01:00 UTC and 02:00 UTC), access to running Virtual Private Servers instances will not be possible during 1 to 5 mins.
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy of our products and services, we will carry out a network hardware upgrade in our Graveline Datacenters.

The operation is carried out in several steps:

- Step 1: Preparation of the operation (about 3 hours)
- Step 2: New hardware implementation (about 2 hours)
- Step 3: Test and activation of the new hardware (about 2 hours)
We would like to inform you that during the second phase of our upcoming operation, scheduled for between 01:00 and 02:00 UTC, a rollback may be required. In this case, VPS instances will continue to run, but access will be temporarily impacted for a duration of less than 5 minutes.

item.description:
Jan 14, 13:46 UTC

Start Time : 14/01/2025 09:39 UTC
End Time : 14/01/2025 10:55 UTC
Root cause : This incident was caused by an electrical issue.

We would like to inform you that the incident on our Dedicated Servers offer has been resolved and the situation is back to normal.
We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident

Jan 14, 11:19 UTC
Identified - An incident is in progress on our Bare Metal offer. It is temporarily impacting availability

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 14/01/2025 09:39 UTC
Service impact : Some of servers in the racks W01A12 and W01A21 are no longer responding.
Root cause : This incident is caused by an electrical issue.
Our teams are fully mobilized and actively working to resolve this problem.

We will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident.
We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [GLOBAL][Virtual Private Servers] - 2016 VPS range manager IP section incident notification
item.description:
Jan 11, 07:30 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 10/01/2025 03:00 UTC
End Time : 10/01/2025 20:00 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : VPS manager IP section.
Customers Impact : The IP address of the customer was missing in the Manager IP section and the IP configuration might have been unreachable if the customer set one.
Root cause : Software issue
We would like to inform you that the incident have been resolved and the situation is back to normal.
An individual communication has been sent to the affected customers.
We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident

Jan 11, 05:06 UTC
Update - Our team is still working to resolve the issue.
An update will be posted as soon as significant progress is made.

Jan 10, 14:54 UTC
Update - Update : Some clients may encounter a network configuration error on their VPS in the 2016 VPS range.
An individual communication will be sent to the affected customers.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Jan 10, 14:23 UTC

Update will be posted as significant progress is made.
Our teams are fully engaged and working to resolve the issue as quickly as possible. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
